ygData.msgSnippet: Which jewel? if it is a specific jewel, imagine the head ache to find the right combo with the right one, yikes!! and btw, how is the unfired vial fired? i
ygData.messageBody:
Which jewel? if it is a specific jewel, imagine the head ache to find the
right combo with the right one, yikes!!

and btw, how is the unfired vial fired? i tried all three of the firing
sheets and none worked. is it more than one sheet? i have only made 4
unfired so far, and saving the last to see if i can make it right :)

Tarlin Oakheart of The Rathe (24 Ranger and going to Mist Moore again)
Jinanu of The Rathe (15 Shaman and hates the animals)
